content.rendered:
WHAT IS WALL PANELLING & DESIGN?

Wall Panelling & Design has become a significant and integral part of contemporary architecture. Today, a great variety of these panels are available, that can be played with in order to create unique and eccentric style patterns. The present day walls panels are made using distinct composite and synthetic materials such as MDF, polyurethane and melamine etc. Also, different wall panels printed with 3D patterns and other intriguing textures can be located in the market, adding a great aesthetic beauty to the walls.

BENEFITS OF WALL PANELLING & DESIGN

Wall Panelling & Design comes with numerous benefits for all home decor enthusiasts.

  • They help in enhancing the appearance of the place with their cutting edge designs along with insulating the area.
  • These wall panels boast of soundproofing qualities that helps to generate an acoustic environment, thus making them ideal for home theatres and media rooms.
  • There is no hassle regarding the maintenance of these wall panels as they require immensely minimal upkeep.
  • They are easy to install, pressure resistant and damage proof, showing very less signs of wear and tear. They generally come with convenient tongue and groove installation systems making them a perfect choice for DIY enthusiasts.
  • They can be installed over the existing walls of your house. This helps in adding multitudinous years of life to your walls by protecting them from spoiling. Furthermore, it is the best decorative treatment for all kinds of walls.

USE WALL PANELLING & DESIGN TO SPRUCE UP YOUR HOME AESTHETICS

These walls panels are extremely convenient and easy to install. They can be used on every wall of a room or for highlighting a particular area. It entirely depends upon you, how you want to install these to spruce up distinct areas of your house. A little patch in the entrance area, or a 3D panel on the highlighter wall of your living room or maybe a wooden wall panel in the ceiling can effectively give a vibrant look to the overall interiors of a place.

WHAT MAKES PLASTER OF PARIS A HIGHLY FAVOURED CHOICE?

Owing to all this, wall panelling has become an extremely important feature in all homes today. They provide a sense of comfort and cosiness, making people enjoy the real luxury of contemporary style patterns. Sometimes, they are even used to hide all the electrical wiring and cables that might just emerge out of the walls.

CHOOSE US

You can successfully browse through the latest collection of these stylish wall panelling designs at Décor Enterprises and therefore enhance the visual appeal of your place.
